newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesia late palm olein stable, interest thin.
newsitem.headline: Indonesia late palm olein stable, interest thin.

text.p: Indonesian palm olein prices were barely changed in late trading on Monday but demand remained weak as buyers held out for weaker values, traders said.
They said olein was quoted at 1,350 rupiah/kg in Jakarta, but offers were also heard at 1,345 rupiah.
The traders said the market also ignored news that crude palm oil production by state plantations would be lower by 20 percent this year from the forecasted 1.8 million tonnes.
An Agriculture Ministry official said on Friday the fall was due to bad weather, ageing trees and the shortage of fertilisers last year.
